content: How can I create an HTML table with three columns for first name, last name, and age?

To create an HTML table with three columns for first name, last name, and age, you can use the following HTML code snippet. This example includes a table header and a few sample rows of data: ```html Sample HTML Table

Sample Table

First Name Last Name Age
John Doe 25
Jane Smith 30
Emily Johnson 22
``` This code creates a basic HTML page with a styled table. The table includes headers for first name, last name, and age, as well as three rows of sample data. You can modify the data within the `` section to fit your needs.
